resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Parameter set of the VNF instance(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: iRATANRSwitch
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Whether the IRAT ANR function is activated or deactivated

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: eNBId
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Unambiguously identifies an eNodeB within a PLMN

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: x2BlackList

resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: List of target nodes prohibited handover

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: x2IpAddressList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: IP addresses used for this ENBFunction's X2 Interface
